text: Vegware is a manufacturer of food and drink packaging made from plant-based materials. It was founded in Edinburgh in 2006 by Joe Frankel. It received the Queen's Award for Innovation in 2016 for saving almost 2 million kilograms of waste from landfill and over 2 million kilograms of carbon. In the 12 months ending January 2019 its turnover was £32.2 million. == References == Category:Manufacturing companies based in Edinburgh Category:2006 establishments in Scotland
title: Vegware
